product_name: BioLite PowerLight LED Lantern and Portable USB Charger
long_description: This USB-chargeable hub doubles as a versatile lantern, casting bright 250-lumen directional lighting or 360 of warm 200-lumen area lighting, while charging your USB devices or NanoGrid system.
short_description: This USB-chargeable hub doubles as a versatile lantern, casting bright 250-lumen directional lighting or 360 of warm 200-lumen area lighting, while charging your USB devices or NanoGrid system.
